entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [JsonConstructor] should not be required on readonly structs with a single parameterized constructor #59309
  • CAI, OCSP and CDP as System.Uri #59305
  • error is given to load p7b in X509Certificate2Collection #59304
  • [API Proposal]: Method to obtain an "empty" JsonDocument #59303
  • Linux/Arm: BBJ_ALWAYS block remains unvisited during dominance computation #59298
    6.0.0
  • Test failure System.ServiceProcess.Tests.ServiceBaseTests.PropagateExceptionFromOnStart #59297
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/providervalidation/providervalidation/providervalidation.sh #59296
    7.0.0
  • Implement `ToString()` on `System.Collections.DictionaryEntry` #59292

Closed

  • Different number decimal separators for the culture fr-CH in different environments #58650
  • WebSocket and multiple reads and writes #58202
    7.0.0
  • Browser WebSocket Improvements #44614
    Future
  • [wasm] ReleaseJSOwnedObjectByGCHandle - Value cannot be null #58031
    7.0.0
  • Unoptimal codegen for Vector<T> init if Vector is not a localVar. #33617
    Future
  • SIGSEGV during rejit process on Ubuntu 18.04 #56663
    7.0.0
  • EventPipeEventDispatcher throttling. #57554
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove redundant checks #59310
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370789 #59308
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370748 #59307
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Print "callsites by likely classes" chart in 'dotnet-pgo dump' command #59306
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370394 #59302
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370286 #59301
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix an occasional small perf issue in `ThreadLocal` constructor/dispose #59300
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • JIT: allow suppressing some dumps or parts of dumps #59299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] x64 on ARM64 fixes #59295
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370052 #59294
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59293
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] Add uploading of intermediate package assets #59291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/6.0-rc2] Update source-gen APIs according to review #59243
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Cleanup defines in DirectoryServices.AccountManager #59265
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Make GCMemoryInfoData blittable #58738
    area-System.Memory
  • JIT: update debug dumping for loop hoisting #59287
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use AVX2 in codegen for GT_STORE_BLK #55604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix a minor assert issue in long decomposition #57326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59285
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Arm: Use correct form of store instruction when data is float #59187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59238
    area-codeflow
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix invalid parsing of not unicode Uri #59252
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent racing on installer shared props/targets #59276
  • [release/6.0] Align preallocationSize behavior #59078
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Fix building GC on Android #58703
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add managed implementation of Math.ILogB and MathF.ILogB #56236
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimize Vector128/256.Equals via TestZ #55875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

Updated

  • Make GetFixedPrefix in SymbolicRegexNode iterative #1569

Issues

Updated

    Any Time

    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Merge issue with 'Use pattern combinator' and fix-all #56523
  • Compiler assumes that null-oblivious assembly would have been able to define a property as `T?` #56518
  • Lifted relational operators returning true should inform nullability tracking that neither operand can be null #56517
  • Add new C# syntax to new IntelliSense suggestions #56511
  • VCS integration - add "safe changes" flag that assures a commit only contains non-logic and visual changes #56510
  • Add shortcut to add additional "if" clause. #56509
  • C# Naming style rules suggest adding regular matches #56508
  • Show region label at #endregion #56507
  • .editorConfig Editor needs some big usability improvements #56506
  • Add fully qualified Using statement #56505
  • In Visual Studio/.editorconfig for C#, add new predefined type preferences "For objects" #56504
  • Consider adding Attribute extension F1 shortcut keys in c#，Link to custom document web site #56503

Closed

  • Analyzer not working using Nuget #56076
    17.0
  • Analyzer to detect boolean expressions and replace them with patterns. #56494
  • Transitive global usings #56520
  • Test plan for "virtual statics in interfaces" #52011
    17.1
  • error CS0171 LayoutKind.Explicit #56512
  • Proposal: Avoid closures that capture a single reference-type variable per function #55758

PullRequests

Created

  • Run the 'use patterns' analyzer on roslyn itself. #56522
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not commit rename session when debugging starts #56519
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56515
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56513
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56514
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56500
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make method extensions #56491
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make abstract type actually implement interface. #56488
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56502
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56501
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56525
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56524
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle user-defined conversions from lambda expressions or method groups to Delegate, Expression, and base types #56416
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Make 'Languages' not part of hte state of an optionset #56489
    Area-IDE
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE
  • When we're loading dependencies in VS, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix partial method doc comments #56419
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #56357
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to publish views of a Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web project #36716
  • blazor = RenderFragment + MarkupString #36714
  • Perf improvement: caching, connectionclosehttps, mvc #36713
  • Behavior is different to what is documented - IFormCollection.Item[String] Property #36712
  • NETSDK1082 There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm' #36711
  • VS2022 Preview 4 Very high CPU Consumption even when Idle #36710
  • Blazor project debugger only breaks on `onchange` event when `onblur` and `onchange` both specified in a text input, and breakpoints are set for both handlers. #36709
  • Running .NET 6 RC1 web application built with the current Angular SPA template generates an [HPM] error after second proxied request #36707
  • Blazor WebAssembly - How can I add a new *.razor page that don't need to recompile or build the project #36704
  • We need better way to deal with css animations. Reliable OnAnimationEnd, allow element to force re-render or something. #36700
  • Closing / Reopening same solution 3-4x + results in Razor SolutionClosing state being invalid #36697
    17.0-Preview5
  • Include AddEndpointsApiExplorer in ASP.NET Core Web API template By default #36696
  • Race condition with component using @ref for cascading value to another component ? #36693
  • Cancel TagHelper resolution on solution close #36692
    17.0-Preview5

Closed

  • .NET 6 rc and Blazor Web Assembly Publish fails from Visual Studio #36641
  • Use SslApplicationProtocol.Http3 constant #36668
    7.0-preview1
  • Unable to publish views of a Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web project #36583
  • WorkerService detect appsettings.json changes #36708
  • MSB3277 warnings when referencing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core and System.Security.Cryptography.Cng #36619
  • Startup regression: plaintext #36611
  • RC1 Failed connection handshake after update from Preview 7 -> RC1 #36672
  • Blocking detected with the framework #36705
  • Issue with running docker-compose on .NET 6 RC1 #36646
  • Blazor Server - Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: } exception with RC1 #36535
  • Perf regression: plaintext #36594
  • Building a 5.0 app with 6.0 SDK in VS 2019 causes analyzers to fail to load #36552
    6.0.0
  • Add out-of-proc test for request queue delegation #28396
    6.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Make `deactivate` clean x86 root #36717
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #36695
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Find inherited TryParse and BindAsync #36694
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Revert Enforce WebSockets Transport for Blazor #36656
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Use SslApplicationProtocol.Http3 #36702
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [Release/6.0-rc2] Fix and test HttpSys delegation #36698
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • open DI in F# webapi project template #36683
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Pin analyzers that ship in the SDK #36690
    7.0-preview1
  • Fix and test HttpSys delegation #36677
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update BlazorServerApp Sample Project #36684
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Always use latest targeting packs #36718
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36657
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Catch exception in TryConvertTo #33594
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 7 Planning
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #36660
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • Find inherited TryParse and BindAsync #36688
    area-web-frameworks
